page.title: 13Thurlow's sports clubs
page.content: The Thurlow area has a good choice of sports clubs. The bowls team plays in th Steeple Bumstead league, 2 football teams play in teh premier and first division of the Halstead league, and the cricket team in a Cambridge area league and in the local Echo Star league. The tennis club was reformed recently with junior and senior sections, a squash club with a slightly declining membership plays at Little Thurlow Hall and badminton is played in the village hall. Both pubs have winter darts teams, and the Rose and Crown team won its summer competition. Crib and dominoes are traditionally played in both pubs. The village reading room with its billiard table has become an unofficial meeting place for some village teenagers who may well progress to the Cock's Thursday pool team in years to come.
